mention.text: Los Angeles County Sheriff Sherman Block
Sheriff Block , an outspoken opponent of semiautomatic assault weapons
an outspoken opponent of semiautomatic assault weapons
California , a political action committee headed by retired Sen. H. L. Richardson
Richard Inglehart , an Alameda County prosecutor and member of the task force drafting the legislation
the task force drafting the legislation
the politically powerful National Rifle Assn.
the Gun Owners of California , a political action committee headed by retired Sen. H. L. Richardson
Lobbyist David Marshall of the NRA
a veteran of previous unsuccessful attempts to outlaw military-type semiautomatics
the military-style semiautomatic gun that often is easily concealed and can be converted to a full automatic
the weapon of choice for drug dealers and street gangs
a law sponsored by the NRA
The drafters of the proposed law enforcement gun bill
guns that may resemble the prohibited firearms
a code phrase for confiscating firearms
state director of Handgun Control Inc. `` We are very anxious to support them
the expertise in defining these assault weapons and how best to restrict them
